import React from "react"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { addReceipt } from "../Redux/Actions"; let ReceiptForm = ({ dispatch }) => { let form; return (
(form = node)} onSubmit={(event) => { event.preventDefault(); const receipt = { id: new Date().getTime(), name: form.name.value, source: form.source.value, ingridients: Array.from( form.ingridients.selectedOptions, (option) => option.value ), time: form.time.value, instructions: form.instructions.value, }; dispatch(addReceipt(receipt)); }} >
{":"}
